How many participants does this client have?
The client plans to include approximately 50 participants in the training program.
What woudl be a great ice breaker for this workshop?

Since this training program is aimed at mid-level managers, senior team leads, and department heads who are seeking to improve their decision-making and innovation skills, an effective ice breaker could be the "Two Truths and a Lie" game. This game involves each participant stating two truths and one lie about themselves in no particular order. Then, the rest of the group tries to guess which one is the lie. This ice breaker can help to instigate a fun, engaging atmosphere while also promoting communication and critical thinking, which are key to the training topics.
